question: The Materiel Management Store will be operating at reduced capacity for the period between July 28 and August 1. We suggest that everyone _______________ and order supplies beforehand.

I’m sorry I couldn’t grant your leave request last week. ________________ my decision, I would’ve allowed you the week off. However, the director felt it was important to have everyone in attendance at the general meeting on Thursday.
The final output specifications are a _________________________ of the services to be provided.
Very often crises are first created by individuals _______________ certain habits in terms of patterns of thinking and behaviour; consequently, many crises can be avoided by changing these habits.

The Deputy Minister may grant a total of ______________ within the fiscal year for family-related responsibilities. Your request may be granted under certain circumstances, such as taking care of a sick member of the family or taking a family member to a medical or dental appointment.
The designated official may require that an activity such as this _______________ when it has been determined that a real or potential conflict of interest exists.
That was my mistake; I _______________ sixteen weeks, not six weeks.
Nevertheless, whenever the anticipated savings _______________ the cost of the study, the preparation of an efficient in-house organizational plan can be justified.

The original Privy Council Office (PCO) RD document is _______________ and is then returned to the PCO. However, we wish to emphasize that the transcriptions circulated to ADMs are identical to the original PCO document.
answers: only seen by the Deputy Minister
seen by the only deputy minister
seen by the deputy minister only
seen only by the Deputy Minister

question: Those wishing _______________ should consult the intranet site which provides guidelines.
answers: to profit from such a leave
to take advantage of such leave
to make the most of such a leave

question: Carl __________ his colleagues a joke that was inappropriate in the workplace.
